verses.text: Ha Jehová ix alan t'a Vajalil: Emanh k'ojan t'a in wach' k'ab' tik, masanto ol wak'kanoch heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayach t'a yalanh oc, xchi Jehová.
Mamin Rey, a Jehová ol ak'an opisio yic tzak' yajalil t'a Sion masanto t'a slajwub' lum lum. Ol ak' yajalil t'a yib'anh heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayach.

Ayic ol ak'an owal yet' heb' ajk'ool, ol ja heb' a chonhab', ol yak'anoch sb'a heb' t'a owal chi' ed'oc. Icha yal ak'wal t'a q'uinhib'alil, icha chi' ol aj sja heb' winh kelemtac t'a jun tzalan to icnhej yaji.
Yak'nac pax kan sti' Jehová, malaj b'ak'uinh ol sk'exa', yalnac t'ayach icha tik: Sacerdote ach t'a masanil tiempo, icha yopisio winhaj Melquisedec, xchi.
Mamin Jehová, ayek' winh Rey t'a a wach' k'ab'. Ha t'a jun k'ual ol te cot yowal winh, ol satjoquel heb' rey yuj winh.
Ha winh ol ak'an syaelal juntzanh niwac nación, ol cham anima, b'alb'umb'a ol aj heb' chamnac yuj winh. Ol satjoquel heb' yajal t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik yuj winh.
Ha t'a yol b'e ol yuk'a' winh Rey t'a jun ha ha' sb'eyi, yuj chi' ol och yip winh.
